analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The reverse order of the dependent origination, The Paṭṭhāna text with the Tikas

original: 23.10. Kusalattika, Sekkhattika🔽Nakusalaṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.🔽Nakusalaṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā abyākato asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nakusalaṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo
analyzed: kusalattika sekkhattika  na kusalam na sekkham dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ sekkhaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe āsevane tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha  na kusalam na asekkham dhammam paccayā abyākataḥ asekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na kusalam na nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ nevasekkha nāsekkhaḥ dhammo
translated: The wholesome triad, The trainee triad🔽With a wholesome and a trainee state as condition, a wholesome and a trainee state arises, a condition being fulfilled. (In brief.) As to cause, six; … as to nutriment, three; … as to result, three; … as to faculty, six.

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca
translated: With a wholesome and a non-trainee state as condition, an indeterminate and a trainee state arises, a condition being fulfilled. (In brief.) As to cause, three; … as to faculty, three; … as to Nāga, three; … as to canker, three; … as to element, three; … as to path, three; … as to jhāna, three; … as to cleansing, three; … as to sphere, three; … as to contact, three; … as to feeling, three; … as to craving, three; … as to clinging, three; … as to becoming, three; … as to birth, three; … as to ageing, three; … as to death, three; … as to sorrow, three; … as to lamentation, three; … as to despair, three; … as to the world, three; … as to the round, three; … as to the round in reverse order, three; … as to the cross-legged sitting, three; … as to the cross-legged sitting in reverse order, three; … as to the proximate, three; … as to the proximate in reverse order, three; … as to the far, three; … as to the far in reverse order, three; … as to the near, three; … as to the near in reverse order, three; … as to the past, three; … as to the future, three; … as to the present, three; … as to the proximate and the present, three; … as to the far and the present, three; … as to the near and the present, three; … as to the past and the present, three; … as to the future and the present, three; … as to the past, future, and present, three; … as to the proximate and the past and the present, three; … as to the far and the past and the present, three; … as to the near and the past and the present, three; …
